name: Human
description: Humans are a diverse and adaptable species, having spread across the temperate moon of Atlah in great numbers. They are known for having many different types of cultures and beliefs, so much so that they often find themselves quarreling with each other.

options.name: Medium
options.description: Humans are medium sized creatures and suffer no penalties or benefits.

options.name: Versatile
options.description: Humans are incredibly adaptable to many types of environments and conditions. Gain +1 skill with resilience and +1 heat and cold mitigation.

options.name: Daily Reaction : Human Destiny
options.description: The threads of destiny bend around humans, allowing them the opportunity to defy fate. Once per day, you can convert any amount of resolve into morale that lasts until the end of the day. If you use this reaction in response to taking damage that causes you to reach 0 health, you gain this as health instead.
